questions.question: You are designing a reinforcement learning workflow in Amazon SageMaker for an AI agent to play a game. Which of the following components are critical to defining the reinforcement learning problem?
options: The reward function, policy gradient, and training job metrics.
The state, actions, environment, and reward function.
The action space, state space, and training job parameters.
The preset files, policy gradient, and reward function.
correct_answers: The state, actions, environment, and reward function.
questions.Practice test: AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test 2 -
